title: Structured Programming Project Learning Based on Smartphones

context.additional_context: A practice-oriented training course for working professionals, structured for smartphone-only accessibility.

learning_goals: Learners can complete three or more practical projects by applying structured programming design principles
Learners cultivate collaborative skills by participating in peer feedback at least twice weekly using mobile learning tools
Learners achieve an average score of 80% or higher in staged quiz assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
